problem.markdown:
id = 3556

if id > 2999:
    print(id, "is a new student")
else:
    print(id, "is an existing student")

The output of the above line of code is ___

( ) "id, is a new student" (x) "3556 is a new student" ( ) "id, is an existing student" ( ) "3556 is an existing student"
